item.title: A new page
item.description: Wysiwyg Mo bettah than what I made before outermost = grid inner = subgrid needs: minimum width, # of stacked items, 100 $100 the squarest placeholder image you will ever see! 400x200 $300 a beautifully rectangular placeholder. 300x700 $500 a tall portrait placeholder. 100x200 $150 one more for good measure. 200x100 $150 and… last one.
